About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

As an Automation Engineer, I've developed a wide range of automated solutions and worked with various QA applications. Currently, I'm completing my bachelor's thesis in Finland, exploring drone tasks using PSOP and Reynolds Flocking algorithms. Passionate about AR and VR software programming, I aim to enhance user experiences through innovative solutions. Open to new experiences, I enjoy learning languages, traveling, and immersing myself in different cultures

Work experiences

Automation Engineer

In my role at Ria Money Transfer, I've been instrumental in developing automated solutions for a variety of needs. My responsibilities have ranged from creating automated tests for REST or SOAP APIs and GUIs, to scripting repetitive tasks. I've collaborated with various departments, both nationally and internationally, to assess and advise on automation approaches

Studies

Summary

I'm a fourth-year Software Engineering student at the Polytechnic University of Madrid and a participant in the 42 Madrid programming training programme. Currently, I'm completing my bachelor's thesis at Lappeenranta-Lahti University of Technology (LUT) in Finland, where I'm exploring drone tasks using PSOP and Reynolds Flocking algorithms

Interests
